017
018package org.tquadrat.foundation.lang;
019
020import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
021import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
022import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotBlankArgument;
024
025import java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler;
026
027import org.apiguardian.api.API;
028import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
029
030/**
031 *  <p>{@summary An implementation of
032 *  {@link ThreadGroup}
033 *  that allows to configure the behaviour of
034 *  {@link #uncaughtException(Thread, Throwable)}}.</p>
035 *  <p>This class is not final, to allow further modifications.</p>
036 *
037 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
038 *  @version $Id: ThreadGroupExt.java 1035 2022-12-07 15:09:56Z tquadrat $
039 *  @since 0.1.0
040 *
041 *  @UMLGraph.link
042 */
043@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ThreadGroupExt.java 1035 2022-12-07 15:09:56Z tquadrat $" )
044@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
045public class ThreadGroupExt extends ThreadGroup
046{
047        /*------------*\
048    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
049        \*------------*/
050    /**
051     *  The
052     *  {@link java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler}
053     *  for this thread group. It can be {@code null}.
054     */
055    private final UncaughtExceptionHandler m_UncaughtExceptionHandler;
056
057        /*------------------------*\
058    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
059        \*------------------------*/
060
061        /*--------------*\
062    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
063        \*--------------*/
064    /**
065     *  <p>{@summary Constructs a new thread group.}</p>
066     *  <p>The parent of this new group is the thread group of the currently
067     *  running thread.</p>
068     *  <p>The behaviour of
069     *  {@link #uncaughtException(Thread, Throwable)}
070     *  is that of the superclass.</p>
071     *
072     *  @param  name    The name of the new thread group.
073     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The {@code name} argument is either
074     *      {@code null}, empty or blank.
075     *  @throws SecurityException   The current thread cannot create a thread
076     *      in this thread group.
077     */
078    public ThreadGroupExt( final String name ) throws IllegalArgumentException
079    {
080        super( requireNotBlankArgument( name, "name" ) );
081        m_UncaughtExceptionHandler = null;
082    }   //  ThreadGroupExt()
083
084    /**
085     *  <p>{@summary Constructs a new thread group.}</p>
086     *  <p>The parent of this new group is the specified thread group.</p>
087     *  <p>The behaviour of
088     *  {@link #uncaughtException(Thread, Throwable)}
089     *  is that of the superclass.</p>
090     *
091     *  @param  parent  The parent thread group.
092     *  @param  name    The name of the new thread group.
093     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The {@code name} argument is either
094     *      {@code null}, empty or blank, or the {@code parent} thread group
095     *      argument is {@code null}.
096     *  @throws SecurityException   The current thread cannot create a thread
097     *      in this thread group.
098     */
099    public ThreadGroupExt( final ThreadGroup parent, final String name ) throws IllegalArgumentException
100    {
101        super( requireNonNullArgument( parent, "parent" ), requireNotBlankArgument( name, "name" ) );
102        m_UncaughtExceptionHandler = null;
103    }   //  ThreadGroupExt()
104
105    /**
106     *  <p>{@summary Constructs a new thread group.}</p>
107     *  <p>The parent of this new group is the thread group of the currently
108     *  running thread.</p>
109     *  <p>The behaviour of
110     *  {@link #uncaughtException(Thread, Throwable)}
111     *  is determined by the provided handler.</p>
112     *
113     *  @param  name    The name of the new thread group.
114     *  @param  handler The handler for the uncaught exceptions.
115     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The {@code name} argument is either
116     *      {@code null}, empty or blank, or the {@code handler} argument is
117     *      {@code null}.
118     *  @throws SecurityException   The current thread cannot create a thread
119     *      in this thread group.
120     */
121    public ThreadGroupExt( final String name, final UncaughtExceptionHandler handler ) throws IllegalArgumentException
122    {
123        super( requireNotBlankArgument( name, "name" ) );
124        m_UncaughtExceptionHandler = requireNonNullArgument( handler, "handler" );
125    }   //  ThreadGroupExt()
126
127    /**
128     *  <p>{@summary Constructs a new thread group.}</p>
129     *  <p>The parent of this new group is the specified thread group.</p>
130     *  <p>The behaviour of
131     *  {@link #uncaughtException(Thread, Throwable)}
132     *  is determined by the provided handler.</p>
133     *
134     *  @param  parent  The parent thread group.
135     *  @param  name    The name of the new thread group.
136     *  @param  handler The handler for the uncaught exceptions.
137     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The {@code name} argument is either
138     *      {@code null}, empty or blank, or one of the {@code parent} thread
139     *      group  or the {@code handler} arguments is {@code null}.
140     *  @throws SecurityException   The current thread cannot create a thread
141     *      in this thread group.
142     */
143    public ThreadGroupExt( final ThreadGroup parent, final String name, final UncaughtExceptionHandler handler ) throws IllegalArgumentException
144    {
145        super( requireNonNullArgument( parent, "parent" ), requireNotBlankArgument( name, "name" ) );
146        m_UncaughtExceptionHandler = requireNonNullArgument( handler, "handler" );
147    }   //  ThreadGroupExt()
148
149        /*---------*\
150    ====** Methods **==========================================================
151        \*---------*/
152    /**
153     *  {@inheritDoc}
154     */
155    @Override
156    public final void uncaughtException( final Thread t, final Throwable e )
157    {
158        if( isNull( m_UncaughtExceptionHandler ) )
159        {
160            super.uncaughtException( t, e );
161        }
162        else
163        {
164            m_UncaughtExceptionHandler.uncaughtException( t, e );
165        }
166    }   //  uncaughtException()
167}
168//  class ThreadGroupExt
169
170/*
171 *  End of File
172 */
